location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'MAP 18. To illustrate Tigris Corps Operation Order No. 26 dated 6th. March 1916'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed on paperDimensions: 355 x 310mm, on sheet 370 x 358mm

mods.abstract: The map accompanies The Campaign in Mesopotamia 1914-1918. Volume II, and shows a region to the east of Kut [Al KÅ«t] in central and eastern Iraq, indicating settlements, rivers and vegetation, with brief descriptions of topography and ground conditions. A short note and a diagram in the lower margin describe the map's grid reference system.Prepared in the Historical Section of the Committee of Imperial Defence, and printed at the Ordnance Survey in 1924.
